alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 29 at 2:16PM CDT until March 31 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ THURSDAY TO 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis. * WHEN...From 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ Thursday to 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
